word: Peter, in his self-confidence, was presumptuous, and fell. Let us learn a lesson from this. Let us not keep our eyes too much on the things that those who know the truth will attempt to do. We need faith,--strong, persevering faith; we need entire trust in our Leader. Our strength lies not in what we--poor, finite beings--suppose we are able to do, but in what we know Christ will do for us. This we may learn from the teachings of Christ. . . .
